# diamond | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ PDFKit ](/documentation/pdfkit)

-  diamond 

Type Property# diamond

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.13+tvOS 11.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
static let diamond: PDFAnnotationLineEndingStyle
```

## [See Also](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotationlineendingstyle/diamond#see-also)

### [Choosing a Line-Ending Style](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotationlineendingstyle/diamond#Choosing-a-Line-Ending-Style)

[`static let circle: PDFAnnotationLineEndingStyle`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotationlineendingstyle/circle)A style that displays a circle line ending and fills it with the annotation’s interior color.[`static let closedArrow: PDFAnnotationLineEndingStyle`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotationlineendingstyle/closedarrow)A style that displays a closed arrowhead line ending and fills it with the annotation’s interior color.[`static let none: PDFAnnotationLineEndingStyle`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotationlineendingstyle/none)[`static let openArrow: PDFAnnotationLineEndingStyle`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotationlineendingstyle/openarrow)A style that displays an open arrowhead line ending.[`static let square: PDFAnnotationLineEndingStyle`](/documentation/pdfkit/pdfannotationlineendingstyle/square)A style that displays a square line ending and fills it with the annotation’s interior color.
